place.name: DAILLY
place.gazetteerText: Dailly, par. and ry. sta., S. Ayrshire, 5½ miles NE. of Girvan, 17,962 ac., pop. 2226; P.O., T.O.; contains the vil. of Dailly, or New Dailly, 1 mile SE. of sta. pop. 696, and the hamlet of Old Dailly. The par. includes the islet of Ailsa Craig. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
